com.khalsa_ji.ems.utils

Class SpringContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khalsa_ji.ems.utils.SpringContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component
public class SpringContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    The class SpringContext implements ApplicationContextAware and overrides the setApplicationContext(ApplicationContext) method. It also provides a method to fetch the instance of ApplicationContext, currently being used.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ravikiran Singh
    See Also:
    ApplicationContextAware, ApplicationContext

      static org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext getAppContext()
      Method to fetch an instance of the ApplicationContext, which refers to the current application's context

      This is the custom definition for the overridden method setApplicationContext of the ApplicationContextAware interface
